Author: Author
menuTip: The menu is in the top-left corner. From the menu you can access Categories, Favorites and more.
offlineTip: You can save books for later and read them offline by clicking the Save offline icon!
languagetip: If you want to change the language, click on the globe at the top-right corner of the screen!
Sign in problem: Oops, there was a problem signing you in.
TutorialStartText: Hi there! This is a quick tutorial on some of the core functionality of the website. Click next for more information.
Add favorite books: Add books to your favorites so you can easily find them later.
Sign in report error: The error has been reported. Please feel free to try signing in again.
An error has occurred: An error has occurred. Please try again.
Prepare translation time: Please wait while we’re preparing the book for translation. This could take some time.
Prepare translation error: Something went wrong while preparing the translation. Please try again.
Added book to your offline library: Added book to your offline library.
You have not translated any books yet: You have not translated any books yet.
Removed book from your offline library: Removed book from your offline library.
Please try searching for something else: Please try searching for something else.
This book is only available for download: This book is only available for download
In the meantime, try going to the start: In the meantime, try going to the start page.
The page you were looking for was taken: The page you were looking for was taken by a 404.
We apologize and we will try our best to: We apologize and we will try our best to correct the issue.
An error occurred while adding this book: An error occurred while adding this book to your offline library.

Having books available even when you are: Having books available even when you are offline is a great way to make sure you always have something to read.
